amendment.description: To eliminate the additional amount for programs under the National and Community Service Act of 1990.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 1202 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 71 - 21. Record Vote Number: 272.
Motion to table amendment SA 1202 made in Senate.
Amendment SA 1202 proposed by Senator Sessions. (consideration: CR S9220; text: CR S9220) To eliminate the additional amount for programs under the National and Community Service Act of 1990.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 1202 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 71 - 21. Record Vote Number: 272.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1202 proposed by Senator Sessions.
